questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change the text color?
questions.explanation: The color property sets the color of text.

questions.question: How do you make the text bold in CSS?
questions.explanation: font-weight: bold; sets the text weight to bold.

questions.question: Which property controls the layout in rows or columns with flexbox?
questions.explanation: flex-direction sets the main axis (row or column).

questions.question: How do you select an element with id 'header' in CSS?
questions.explanation: Use #header to select an element by id.
